Upon seeing this I too followed but could not stop in timethus my bus collided into the rear of PA7780R. I check pax for injuries. I was informed that a M/pax had fell off his seat and feeling pain on the back of his head. He refused med attn. I told other pax to transfered to next bus. OCC informed.I proceed to next bstop as not to obstruct traffic. The same M/pax informed me again of pain at the back of his head. I informed OCC and AMB was activated. Said pax was conveyed TTSH. I exchange particulars of driverPA7780R and the conveyed pax.TP attended scene.
